page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN OUR AREA
page.content: We decided to make a survey of {employment}in our area and use our school parents as a sample. We devised a{questionnaire}which we gave out to the school. We had 154 answers. When we examined them, we found that{139 {fathers are employed,}22 of whom are self-employed, 112 fathers work full time and 5 work part time. The remaining 15 or 10% are unemployed. { 125 mothers are employed,}25 of these are self-employed, 30 mothers work full time and 70 work part time, 29 mothers are house-wives. The{biggest employer}was the County Council whilst Whitbreads Brewery, Stenners Engineering and Tiverton Poultry Packers each employ 9 parents. 17 parents are employed in food distribution. 8 parents work for the NHS and the rest work for services, e.g. hairdressers and cleaners.
